Articles.Content: I'm going to start RO Configs soon, anyone have any ideas on bug fixes? I know Kart is good at this kind of thing
Haha I'll test today and I will report any bugs here!
Not going to say what's going on, but different Martian mod leaders are talking about something...

Not going to say what's going on, but different Martian mod leaders are talking about something...

I smell a Martian mega mod
I'll be away for the weekend, so no updates or anything. See you guys on the other side!

Ok I'm back, I have no idea what took me so long. I'll continue work on this over the next few weeks. I think Triston has the supply craft done but I haven't been able to contact him. I'm starting a new mod, so that'll take a lot of my attention. That's in my sig. And of course there is school.

Development won't stop, but it will defiantly slow down.
Is there a pic of the Delta IX yet?

Not yet, I'm waiting for Kart's Delta IV to release on his thread, and then I'm working with him to modify that into Delta IX. I think he said 2 weeks on Delta IV? After that, I'd give it another 2 weeks. Note: dates not final

Not really. F9 in < 2 weeks now, then D4. I'll have to upgrade it to a higher number of sides (48 instead of 24), which basically means 'redo it from scratch'. So, I think that mid-december should work out pretty well, noonespecial is also back in business and will do the DCSS and the RL 10 family, so I don't have to worry about those. Then two weeks maybe for DIX, if all goes as planned, so you should have it around the beginning of the new year.

I'm sorry that this all takes so long, but the work I have to do for school now gets more and more, which doesn't really makes things easier.

We KerbFilm Studio are currently working on Chinese pack Continued, we have already finish CZ-5&CZ-3B. We would like to invite you to work with us.

Not yet, I'm waiting for Kart's Delta IV to release on his thread, and then I'm working with him to modify that into Delta IX. I think he said 2 weeks on Delta IV? After that, I'd give it another 2 weeks. Note: dates not final

Please do some RO configs!
Little unrelated mini poll: who wants a Millennium Falcon mod?
Maybe focus on finishing what you've already started instead of delving into yet another development? A Millennium Falcon seems kind of pointless in a game like KSP imo.

[quote name='Sharkman Briton']Please do some RO configs![/QUOTE]
RSS/RO configs (of CZ-9) is currently WIP [s](currently not?)[/s] by we ChinesePackContinued team [s](I'm not doing... I'm busydoing CZ-6 things)[/s]. [s]See my signature for more details.[/s]Signature lost whe using phone to edit this. See my profile fore more about that pack. Edited November 21, 2015 by 01010101lzy
is this mod compatible with ksp 1.0.2? this mod looks great!

Well in the movie, the obviously couldn't create a bunch of new rockets. They showed the Atlas V-541 (MSL) for the first portion of Delta IX flight and an early Delta (I think it was a 3914 model) for the disintegration. It was obviously from the failed GOES-G launch, where the RS-27 engine shut down and the rocket toppled over. For the Taiyang Shen launch, they simply showed a bunch of clips from the Atlas V-401 (DMSP-5D3 F19) launch.

Hey guys. got some bad news. Due to lack of time and interest for this mod, I'm going to abandon it here. There were so many unsolved bugs thathave been around for months it just got annoying. If someone wants to take over please send me a pm. I will be trying to make one or two new mods to get back into modding. Thanks guys.

Major Leauge
Hey, Major, instead of just abandoning it, just take an extended break.
It's been on a break since October, is that extended? I should have a new rocket done by Feb anyways, maybe I'll just leave this be for a bit and come back in a few weeks.

I am sure that the engine YF200 has a lag because of the mesh collider, replace it with a CUBE in Unity, and it will stop lags.

In general, the best mesh do in Unity, it is much more efficient.
I can try to help (I'm learning how to mod and I can continue)

Sorry for not updating, I have time to do things now, including

How's that going Tris? Do you have it in game yet? I might have found one of the bugs for the engines. It appears it shares the .90 LV-T45 exhaust textures, which no longer exist in the game. I'm going to upgrade it to KS-25 exhaust. And that other bug, no idea.
